editorialNotes.standard: Clobber pesky rebels while rallying villagers and recruiting heroes in this idle strategic defense game.

editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: It's hard to understate Clash of Clansâ€™ massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobile. Over time the build, train, and attack gameplay has been honed to perfection through fantastic updates. We still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught, and to experience the rush of victory after our carefully assembled attack force yet again smashed through enemy defenses.

ios.subtitle: Open and stack the new states

editorialNotes.standard: Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercellâ€™s awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package thatâ€™s easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, thereâ€™s no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

editorialNotes.standard: A phenomenon from the start, PokÃ©mon GO hasnâ€™t stopped evolving. Since launch, the best-in-class location-based AR game has expanded with countless improvements. Hatch eggs while the game runs in the background. Battle other trainers with your favorite creatures. Join memorable community day events. With a steady stream of awesome updates and hundreds of iconic creatures to catch, Nianticâ€™s groundbreaking hit just keeps getting better.

Years ago, Plants vs. Zombies defined a genre with its fresh concept, undeniable charm, and innovative, balanced gameplay. Now the undead have risen again, bringing with them new time-traveling tales and a massive slew of new zombies and plants. Whether you stomp enemies without paying a dime or buy new experimental plants and power-ups with In-App Purchases, the result is the same: an incredible sequel that's fresh and fun throughout, reminding us why we fell in love with this world in the first place.

Build the metropolis of your dreams in this free-to-play city builder from EA. Stunning graphics, intuitive controls, and addictive mechanics make the experience truly extraordinary. Behind its polished gleam, SimCity BuildIt retains the same high-quality gameplay fans have come to expect from this enduring franchise.
The cheerful humor of the Bikini Bottom crew keeps us smiling as we juggle orders in chaotic cooking challenges.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Spruce up the Batcave and recruit dozens of DC heroes to safeguard reality in this superpowered strategy game.

ios.subtitle: Chef, time to cook tasty food!
This game is not what it seems

editorialNotes.standard: Presented as a holotable full of Star Wars champions, Galaxy of Heroes lets you form a team and leap into thrilling turn-based battles. Playing as Luke Skywalker, Boba Fett, Ahsoka Tano and other characters from the films and animated series, youâ€™ll need smart tactics to beat enemy squads. Missions take you from Hoth to Tatooine to Imperial shipsâ€”and gorgeous graphics make every sabre slash and blaster shot look spectacular. Even when youâ€™re not fighting, though, the piles of unlockable characters, gear and abilities ensure youâ€™ll have plenty to do.

ios.subtitle: Get trains from A to B!

editorialNotes.standard: Donâ€™t let the carefree playroom setting fool youâ€”ensuring trains stay on track in this clever puzzler keeps our brains moving at full steam.

editorialNotes.standard: Reworked and retrofitted for gaming on the go, League of Legends: Wild Rift brings the franchiseâ€™s twitchy thrills, unmatched depth, and nail-biting tactics to iPhone and iPad. Each match is a fast-paced 5v5 tug-of-war. Pick from dozens of champions and head onto the battlefield, charging down one of three lanes as you help your team destroy the enemyâ€™s Nexus. Combining slick, accessible touchscreen controls with the tactical brilliance that turned League of Legends into a worldwide sensation, Wild Rift is a must-play MOBA for newcomers and vets alike.

editorialNotes.standard: Dominate the lanes of this highly polished multiplayer online battle arena as a rocket-loving robot, a bunny-like mage, or another unique hero from a list of dozens.

No mere port of a pre-existing classic, this is a stunning reimagining of perhaps our most beloved business-building sim. We love snagging new card packs to build bigger and better rides, and our inner Walt Disney obsesses over the perfect placement of attractions, restaurants, and, of course, restroomsâ€”you never know when a customer is going to find one of our roller coaster creations a little too intense.

Nostalgia rules in this bite-size tactical battler, which lets you rewrite Gundam history by building a squad of all-time greats.

editorialNotes.standard: Blizzardâ€™s first iOS game takes the form of a wonderfully robust card battler. Hearthstone's gameplay strikes an enchanting balanceâ€”it's easy enough for anyone to pick up in short sessions, yet deep enough to keep the experience feeling fresh. Whether you're practicing against the computer or creating your own intricate deck of minions, Hearthstone gleams with the polish of premier development.
